title: Go Tell It On the Mountain dirt

content.question: Throughout the passage, the narrator draws a comparison between the literal dirt in the house and metaphorical moral “filth” most clearly in order to

choices.label: emphasize John’s feelings of dissatisfaction and resentment
show how John’s failings have had an effect on the entire family
indicate that poor living conditions can lead to poor behavior
suggest the possibility that one’s sins can be washed away

content.answer: emphasize John’s feelings of dissatisfaction and resentment

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
